#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ULL unsigned long long
using namespace std;
int Q,N,M;
ULL test(ULL N,ULL M){
  ULL r1=(ULL)(M)*N-M-N+__gcd(M,N);
  ULL G=__gcd(M,N);
  ULL X;
  ULL r2=(((ULL)(M)*N/G)*(G-1))/2-N;
  X=N/G+((M/G-1)/2)*(N/G-1)+((M/G)%2?0:N/(2*G));
  r2+=G*X;
  r2*=2;
  return r2;
  return r1;
//  printf("%lld %lld\n",r1,r2);

}
int main(){
scanf("%d",&Q);
while(Q--){
  scanf("%d %d",&N,&M);
  printf("%llu\n",test(N,M));
}




}
